shot.composition: Extreme Close-Up on the chef's hands and the burger being assembled, shallow depth of field.
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Lateral slider movement, slow and smooth, following the chef's hand movements. Sequence 2 (4-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.
shot.frame_rate: 48 fps (for slight slow motion in post-production, giving a more dramatic look)

facial_features.hair: Short, under a black chef's hat

wardrobe.upper_body: Pristine white chef jacket, black collar, dark brown leather apron

sequences.primary_motion: Meticulous assembly of a gourmet burger: precise placement of the juicy beef patty, addition of melted cheese, crunchy vegetables, and a creamy sauce. The movement is precise and intentional.
sequences.camera_follows: Close tracking of the initial action

sequences.primary_motion: The subject continues the action with increased confidence and detail. Meticulous assembly of a gourmet burger: precise placement of the juicy beef patty, addition of melted cheese, crunchy vegetables, and a creamy sauce evolves into a more complete demonstration, showing mastery and precision.
sequences.camera_follows: Medium shot capturing the full context and environment interaction

sequences.primary_motion: The subject completes the action with a satisfied expression, looks at the result with approval, and shows a subtle smile of accomplishment. Final moment captures the positive outcome.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on facial expression and final result, ending with a confident pose

scene.location: Open kitchen of a gourmet restaurant, polished black marble countertop.

layout.width: Clean and organized workspace, fresh ingredients arranged artistically.
layout.walls: Brushed stainless steel and glossy white subway tiles.

environment.background: Slight blurred kitchen activity in the background (bokeh), steam rising from the cooking plate, soft ambient lighting.
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Soft directional light (Softbox) above the burger, acting as a key light.
lighting.quality: Soft and flattering light to highlight textures, shiny reflections on the sauce and cheese.
lighting.color_temperature: Warm (3200K - Tungsten) to accentuate the appetizing and 'golden hour' look of the food.
lighting.key_to_fill_ratio: 3:1 (High contrast for a dramatic 'food porn' effect)
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Rich in warm colors (reds, oranges, browns) and saturated for the ingredients.
color_grading.tone: Cinematic, saturated, contrasted, with deep blacks and soft highlights.

audio.ambient: Subtle background noise of a professional kitchen (sizzle of the cooking plate, clinking of utensils, distant murmurs of customers).
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Hyperrealistic and amplified sounds: meat sizzle, sauce squish, vegetable crunch, dry sound of bread closing. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: Discreet and sophisticated jazzy or instrumental hip-hop ambiance music. The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles. Focus on the food and the action.
visual_rules.realism: Hyperrealistic rendering of products with visible premium finishes. Commercial lighting highlighting key features. Precise material textures (wood, metal, glass, plastic). Selective depth of field directing attention.
visual_rules.continuity: Consistency in product presentation and staging. Maintaining retail ambiance and brand identity. Continuity of commercial lighting and signage. Smooth shopping journey and discovery.
